item.title: 瑞士央行行长施莱格尔称，瑞士物价压力基本未变
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁·施莱格尔表示，瑞士的通胀状况与去年基本持平。【原文：Switzerland’s inflation situation is basically unchanged from last year, according to Swiss National Bank President Martin Schlegel.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌，交易员权衡数十亿美元的人工智能支出计划
item.description: 周四美国股市下跌，交易员们在高消费科技股中筛选赢家与输家，抵消了共和党与民主党可能达成协议避免政府停摆的乐观情绪。【原文：US equities dropped on Thursday as traders sifted through the winners and losers among big-spending technology names, offsetting optimism that Republicans and Democrats may strike a deal to avoid a US government shutdown.】

item.title: 美元走软是全球投资者对冲风险的信号，联合集团表示
item.description: 资产管理公司联合赫尔墨斯公司表示，美元本月在美股和美债市场保持稳定的情况下持续走弱，表明全球投资者正在增加对美元贬值的对冲操作，而非抛售美国资产。【原文：The dollar’s slump this month in the face of steady US stock and bond markets suggests that global investors are raising their hedges against a weaker greenback rather than dumping American assets, says money manager Federated Hermes Inc.】

item.title: AMC与债权人达成修订协议，为再融资扫清障碍
item.description: 据周四提交的文件显示，AMC娱乐控股公司已与债权人集团达成协议，修改其其中一份票据的条款，这将使这家连锁影院更容易为其债务进行再融资。【原文：AMC Entertainment Holdings, Inc. reached a deal with a group of creditors to change the terms in one of its notes, making it easier for the cinema chain to refinance its debt, according to a filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 南园共同体筹建5亿美元基金打造"反加速器"
item.description: 南园共同体的投资者们意识到，有前途的创始人创业时可以寻求帮助的地方有很多。【原文：The investors at South Park Commons realize there are a lot of places that promising founders can go for help when they’re starting companies.】

item.title: 受38%利率吸引，套利交易投资者蜂拥涌入米莱的比索市场
item.description: 本世纪以来，阿根廷比索贬值幅度居全球主要货币之首，长期被视为过于动荡而难以吸引套利交易投资者。但随着总统哈维尔·米莱所在政党赢得中期选举胜利，投资者信心显著回升，越来越多的迹象表明，这些投资者正开始大量涌入比索市场。【原文：Having lost more of its value than any other major currency in the world this century, the Argentine peso has long been seen as far too unstable to lure carry-trade investors. But in a sign of just how much President Javier Milei has regained investor confidence in the wake of his party’s midterm-election victory, evidence is mounting that those investors are starting to pile into the peso.】

item.title: ASML与SAP凸显人工智能赢家与输家差距扩大
item.description: 短短48小时内，欧洲两大科技股的命运起伏，生动展现了人工智能热潮如何迅速催生投资者对赢家与输家的抉择。【原文：In the space of 48 hours, the fate of Europe’s top two tech stocks has shown how fast the artificial intelligence boom is causing investors to pick winners and losers.】

item.title: 印度经济调查报告提出社交媒体年龄限制
item.description: 印度《经济调查报告》将基于年龄的社交媒体使用限制列为讨论议题，尽管多个国家已采取措施限制未成年人使用社交媒体平台。【原文：India’s Economic Survey raised age-based restrictions on social media use as an issue for discussion, even as several countries have already taken steps to limit minors’ access to social media platforms.】

item.title: 银行首席执行官们承诺加强战略审查，标志着欧盟市场加速发展
item.description: 多家欧洲大型银行表示将扩大重大风险转移业务的运用，这强烈预示着该资产类别将继续保持快速增长态势。【原文：Several big European banks said they will expand the use of significant risk transfers, sending a strong signal the asset class will continue to grow at a rapid clip.】

item.title: Paytm连续第三年盈利，业务强势反弹
item.description: Paytm连续第三个季度实现盈利，得益于销售额增长和成本削减，这家印度金融科技先驱企业由此从监管困境中实现反弹。【原文：Paytm reported a third straight profitable quarter, helped by rising sales and cost cuts that have helped the Indian fintech pioneer rebound from regulatory troubles.】

item.title: 中国同意将英国威士忌关税减半至5%，英国政府宣布
item.description: 英国首相基尔·斯塔默的办公室表示，中国将把英国威士忌的进口关税从10%降至5%，降幅达50%。【原文：China is set to halve its import tariffs on British whisky to 5% from 10%, Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s office said.】

item.title: 美国贸易逆差扩大，创2009年以来最小值，进口量上升
item.description: 美国11月贸易赤字扩大，从2009年以来最低水平回升，原因是进口反弹而出口下滑，凸显出在特朗普政府摇摆不定的关税政策影响下，贸易数据存在显著的月度波动。【原文：The US trade deficit widened in November from the lowest level since 2009 as imports rebounded and exports fell, highlighting wide monthly swings in response to the Trump administration’s vacillating tariffs.】

item.title: 美国假日周初请失业金人数小幅下降至20.9万
item.description: Applications for US unemployment benefits were little changed last week, adding to evidence of some stabilization in the labor market.

item.title: 加拿大贸易赤字扩大，因黄金和汽车出口下滑
item.description: 加拿大贸易赤字扩大幅度超出预期，原因是波动性较大的黄金运输量下降，以及机动车及零部件的进出口均出现下滑。【原文：Canada’s trade deficit widened by more than expected as volatile gold shipments fell and both exports and imports of motor vehicles and parts decreased.】

item.title: 印度专家小组建议降低波动性食品价格在通胀指标中的权重
item.description: 印度政府一个小组建议大幅降低用于确定零售通胀率的食品价格权重，此举可能有助于央行更有效地实施货币政策。【原文：An Indian government panel has proposed a sharp reduction in the share of food prices used to determine retail inflation, a move that could help the central bank conduct monetary policy more effectively.】

item.title: 长期国债价格波动，交易员静候美国就业数据
item.description: 美国国债价格波动，因投资者正密切关注就业数据以获取利率路径的线索，而大宗商品价格飙升则加剧了对顽固通胀的担忧。【原文：US Treasuries fluctuated as investors looked ahead to jobs data for clues on the path of interest rates and surging commodity prices kindled concerns about sticky inflation.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级企业高管团体质疑卡尼应对特朗普的策略
item.description: 加拿大首席执行官协会负责人质疑马克·卡尼处理与白宫关系的举措，呼吁总理专注于挽救北美贸易协定。【原文：The head of an organization that represents Canadian chief executives questioned Mark Carney’s handling of the relationship with the White House, calling on the prime minister to focus on salvaging the North American trade pact.】

item.title: 美印在果阿能源峰会上商讨扩大煤炭贸易
item.description: 美国和印度官员周四表示，两国正在商讨如何促进煤炭贸易，双方都认为这种燃料对能源安全至关重要。【原文：US and India are in talks to boost the trade of coal, a fuel both nations consider key to energy security, their officials said Thursday.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团计划发行1500亿日元债券以实现信贷组合多元化
item.description: 知情人士透露，阿达尼集团计划在未来一年半内发行价值高达15亿美元的日元计价债券，以实现融资渠道多元化。【原文：Adani Group is seeking to raise as much as $1.5 billion worth of yen-denominated debt in the next year and a half in a bid to diversify its financing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: South Africa Holds Key Interest Rate as Inflation Outlook Cools
item.description: 南非央行如预期暂停宽松周期，因通胀前景略有降温。【原文：South Africa’s central bank paused its easing cycle as expected amid a slightly cooler outlook for inflation.】

item.title: BBVA计划推出与70亿欧元资产挂钩的风险转移交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，BBVA SA计划发行两笔重大风险转移交易，涉及约70亿欧元（84亿美元）的资产。【原文：BBVA SA plans to issue two significant risk transfer deals linked to around €7 billion ($8.4 billion) of assets, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能房地产企业获得1亿美元私募信贷贷款
item.description: 房地产科技公司Propy首次进军私募信贷市场，成功筹集1亿美元资金以支持该初创企业的收购战略。【原文：Propy, a real estate technology company, tapped the private credit market for the first time, securing $100 million to support the startup’s acquisition strategy.】

item.title: 沙特曼纳拉公司就进军金属贸易领域征询企业意见
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯国有金属与矿业公司正与全球多家大型商品交易商洽谈拓展贸易业务，随着该王国在全球供应链中的影响力不断扩大。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s state-controlled metals and mining vehicle is in talks with some of the world’s biggest commodity houses over a push into trading, as the kingdom expands its presence in global supply chains.】

item.title: 罗杰斯财报亮眼，蓝鸟队赛季助推营收增长
item.description: 罗杰斯通讯公司第四季度业绩超出分析师预期，得益于其媒体业务板块的强劲增长以及旗下多伦多蓝鸟棒球队打入世界大赛。【原文：Rogers Communications Inc. beat analysts’ fourth-quarter estimates thanks to strong growth in its media segment and a World Series appearance by its Toronto Blue Jays baseball team.】

item.title: 菲亚特、丰田大亨领投初创企业RobCo，融资额达1亿美元
item.description: 德国初创企业RobCo专注于制造工业机器人，近日获得1亿美元融资，投资方包括菲亚特母公司Stellantis NV和Exor NV背后的家族，以及一位亿万富翁丰田经销商。【原文：RobCo, a German startup that makes robots for use in manufacturing, has raised $100 million in financing from investors including the family behind Fiat parent Stellantis NV and Exor NV, and a billionaire Toyota dealer.】

item.title: 加密货币"数字黄金"神话破灭，交易者转向实物金属
item.description: Bitcoin’s “digital gold” promise is unraveling as traders forgo the token for surging metals, hurting a narrative that once defined the asset’s macro appeal.

item.title: 贝莱德与合伙集团联合推出私人财富管理账户
item.description: 贝莱德集团与合作伙伴集团控股公司共同推出双方合作的首个私募市场投资项目，旨在分得富人手中数万亿美元资产的一杯羹。【原文：BlackRock Inc. and Partners Group Holding AG launched the first joint private-markets investment of their partnership aimed at grabbing a slice of the trillions of dollars sitting in the hands of wealthy individuals.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比股价飙升，需求加速推动船队扩张
item.description: 皇家加勒比邮轮公司股价飙升，因邮轮度假需求持续加速增长，该公司船队规模或将新增多达六艘邮轮。【原文：Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd. shares jumped as demand for cruise holidays keeps accelerating, which could see the liner add as many as six additional ships to its fleet.】

item.title: 印度液化天然气买家与全球生产商陷入斗鸡博弈
item.description: 全球范围内正涌现出一波新的燃料供应，但印度买家正等待价格合适时再出手。【原文：There’s a wave of fuel supply coming online around the world, but buyers in India are waiting until the price is right.】

item.title: 美联储意外出现沃勒异议被视为孤注一掷之举
item.description: 我是克里斯·安斯蒂，波士顿资深经济编辑。今天我们将探讨美联储周三一场引发争议的反对票。欢迎将反馈与线索发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。若您尚未订阅本通讯，可点击此处完成注册。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey , a senior economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at a dissenting vote at the Fed Wednesday that raised some eyebrows. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net . And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here .】
